title: LF Duo Partner Bronze - Silver - Gold
body:
Hey Guys,

I am climbing hard looking to find a good duo partner that does not rage and has skype.  I am 25 currently sitting at b1 i play any role but main adc. IGN is KINGOFTHRON3S.  Also keen on joining a ranked team that is wanting to play the game and not be a troll. 

Regards

KING

replies.body: I'll add you and we can talk, I main support and was Silver 3 last season (BestLuxEVER)

whats with the one digit KDA #lol
add me, I can help you get into silver at least.
Add me - mention you're looking to duo queue.
